title: Kaō, Kumamoto
text:
was a <a href="List%20of%20towns%20in%20Japan">town</a> located in <a href="Kamoto%20District%2C%20Kumamoto">Kamoto District</a>, <a href="Kumamoto%20Prefecture">Kumamoto Prefecture</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>.
As of 2003, the town had an estimated <a href="population">population</a> of 5,099 and a <a href="population%20density">density</a> of 162.03 persons per km². The total area was 31.47 km².
On January 15, 2005, Kaō, along with the towns of <a href="Kahoku%2C%20Kumamoto">Kahoku</a>, <a href="Kamoto%2C%20Kumamoto">Kamoto</a> and <a href="Kikuka%2C%20Kumamoto">Kikuka</a> (all from <a href="Kamoto%20District%2C%20Kumamoto">Kamoto District</a>), was merged into the expanded city of <a href="Yamaga%2C%20Kumamoto">Yamaga</a> and no longer exists as an independent <a href="Municipalities%20of%20Japan">municipality</a>.
